bibl.title: in collaboration with J.E.G. WHITEHORNE and R.W. DANIEL, Greek Papyri from Kellis. I (P. Kell. G.) Nos 1-90. (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 3 = Oxbow Monograph 54.)
bibl.note: P. Kellis Gr. I, 1-90. - 83 texts written on papyrus, 7 on wood, from the fourth century A.D.: documents and letters (1-81), astrological, magical and medical texts (82-89), school exercise (90).
WORP K.A. (edited by), in collaboration with J.E.G. WHITEHORNE and R.W. DANIEL, Greek Papyri from Kellis. I (P. Kell. G.) Nos 1-90. (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 3 = Oxbow Monograph 54.)
Oxford, Oxbow Books, 1995, 4°, xi-281 pp., 2 plans et 79 pll. ISBN 0-946897-97-2. £45.
